label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡绿脓杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"绿脓杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":15,"end":20,"text":"雏鸡传染病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":22,"end":24,"text":"拉稀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":29,"text":"呼吸困难","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"皮下水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"抗菌消炎","labels":["control"]}]
text: 鸡绿脓杆菌病，由绿脓杆菌引起的雏鸡传染病。以拉稀、呼吸困难、皮下水肿为特征。治宜抗菌消炎。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"绿脓杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":18,"text":"革兰氏阴性的绿脓杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 绿脓杆菌病本病由革兰氏阴性的绿脓杆菌感染引起，主要危害10日龄内的雏鸡。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"鸡绿脓杆菌病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":8,"end":12,"text":"绿脓杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":19,"end":24,"text":"败血性疾病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":14,"end":16,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 鸡绿脓杆菌病是由绿脓杆菌引起雏鸡的一种败血性疾病。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"绿脓杆菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 绿脓杆菌属假单胞菌属，革兰氏染色阴性，为两端钝圆的短小杆菌，能运动，菌体一端有一根鞭毛，细菌大小为1.5～3.0µm×0.5～O.8µm，单在或成双排列，偶见短链。

label: [{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":11,"end":15,"text":"吃食减少","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"精神不振","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":21,"end":27,"text":"不同程度下痢","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"粪便水样","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":34,"end":38,"text":"淡黄绿色","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":39,"end":47,"text":"严重病鸡粪中带血","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":48,"end":52,"text":"腹部膨大","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":53,"end":57,"text":"手压柔软","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":63,"end":67,"text":"腹式呼吸","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":72,"end":83,"text":"眼周围发生不同程度水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":81,"end":83,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":84,"end":93,"text":"水肿部破裂流出液体","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":94,"end":98,"text":"形成痂皮","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":99,"end":105,"text":"眼全闭或半闭","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":106,"end":108,"text":"流泪","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":109,"end":115,"text":"颈部皮下水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":113,"end":115,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":30,"text":"粪便","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":44,"text":"粪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":48,"end":50,"text":"腹部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":50,"end":52,"text":"膨大","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":72,"end":73,"text":"眼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":99,"end":100,"text":"眼","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":109,"end":113,"text":"颈部皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":58,"end":60,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":70,"end":72,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"水样","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":41,"end":43,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 临床症状：病鸡主要表现吃食减少，精神不振；不同程度下痢，粪便水样，呈淡黄绿色，严重病鸡粪中带血；腹部膨大，手压柔软，病鸡后期呈腹式呼吸；有的病鸡眼周围发生不同程度水肿，水肿部破裂流出液体，形成痂皮，眼全闭或半闭，流泪；颈部皮下水肿。

label: [{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":27,"end":29,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":38,"end":40,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":4,"end":15,"text":"两腿内侧部皮下也见水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"水肿","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":29,"end":37,"text":"绿脓杆菌性关节炎","labels":["disease"]},{"start":42,"end":53,"text":"跗关节和跖关节明显肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":53,"text":"肿胀","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":54,"end":56,"text":"微红","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":57,"end":59,"text":"跛行","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":63,"end":67,"text":"不能站立","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":68,"end":74,"text":"以跗关节着地","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"两腿","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":45,"text":"跗关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":46,"end":49,"text":"跖关节","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":69,"end":72,"text":"跗关节","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 严重病鸡两腿内侧部皮下也见水肿。魏华德(1992)报道雏鸡绿脓杆菌性关节炎，病鸡表现跗关节和跖关节明显肿胀、微红，跛行，严重者不能站立，以跗关节着地。

label: [{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"颈部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":10,"end":14,"text":"脐部皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":18,"text":"黄绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":23,"text":"脐部皮下呈黄绿色胶冻样浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":23,"text":"浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":34,"text":"肌肉有出血点或出血斑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":34,"text":"出血斑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":30,"text":"出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":45,"text":"内脏器官不同程度充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":49,"end":55,"text":"肝脏脆而肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":57,"end":60,"text":"土黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":61,"end":71,"text":"有淡灰黄色小点坏死灶","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":72,"end":76,"text":"胆囊充盈","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":74,"end":76,"text":"充盈","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":62,"end":66,"text":"淡灰黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"内脏器官","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":49,"end":51,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":72,"end":74,"text":"胆囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":43,"end":45,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":51,"end":55,"text":"脆而肿大","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 病理变化：病鸡颈部、脐部皮下呈黄绿色胶冻样浸润，肌肉有出血点或出血斑。内脏器官不同程度充血、出血。肝脏脆而肿大，呈土黄色，有淡灰黄色小点坏死灶。胆囊充盈。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"肾脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":14,"text":"表面有散在出血小点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":19,"text":"肺脏充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"见出血点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":34,"text":"肺小叶炎性病变","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":32,"text":"炎性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":39,"text":"紫红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":40,"end":46,"text":"大理石样变化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":46,"text":"紫红色或大理石样变化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"肺脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":27,"end":30,"text":"肺小叶","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 肾脏肿大，表面有散在出血小点。肺脏充血，有的见出血点，肺小叶炎性病变，呈紫红色或大理石样变化。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"心冠脂肪出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":8,"end":14,"text":"有胶冻样浸润","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":18,"end":25,"text":"外膜有出血斑点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"出血斑点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"心冠脂肪","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":15,"end":17,"text":"心内","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"外膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 心冠脂肪出血，并有胶冻样浸润，心内、外膜有出血斑点。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"腺胃粘膜脱落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"脱落","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":15,"text":"肌胃粘膜有出血斑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"出血斑","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"易于剥离","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":26,"text":"肠粘膜充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":26,"text":"充血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":27,"end":31,"text":"出血严重","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":35,"text":"脾肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":33,"end":35,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":36,"end":41,"text":"有出血小点","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"气囊混浊","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"混浊","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":49,"text":"增厚","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"腺胃粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":7,"end":11,"text":"肌胃粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":21,"end":24,"text":"肠粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":32,"end":33,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"气囊","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 腺胃粘膜脱落，肌胃粘膜有出血斑，易于剥离，肠粘膜充血、出血严重。脾肿大，有出血小点。气囊混浊、增厚。

label: [{"start":4,"end":6,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":16,"end":23,"text":"绿色的蜂窝织炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":16,"end":18,"text":"绿色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":34,"text":"免疫器官淋巴组织萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":41,"text":"淋巴细胞排空","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":41,"text":"排空","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":24,"end":28,"text":"免疫器官","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"淋巴组织","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"淋巴细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 人工感染病鸡的病变为注射部位呈现绿色的蜂窝织炎，免疫器官淋巴组织萎缩，淋巴细胞排空。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"脾鞘动脉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":0,"end":12,"text":"脾鞘动脉周围纤维素性变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"变性","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":15,"end":16,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":44,"end":45,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":17,"end":24,"text":"化脓性脑膜脑炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":34,"text":"局灶性肝坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":32,"end":34,"text":"坏死","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":41,"text":"间质性心肌炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":45,"end":55,"text":"肺小叶出血性坏死性炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"脑膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":32,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":45,"end":48,"text":"肺小叶","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 脾鞘动脉周围纤维素性变性，多数鸡见化脓性脑膜脑炎，少数见局灶性肝坏死和间质性心肌炎，个别鸡肺小叶出血性坏死性炎。

label: [{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"病死鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":17,"end":19,"text":"心血","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":21,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":22,"end":23,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":24,"end":25,"text":"肺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"胸腹部","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"皮下","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 1、病料的采集与分离培养：取病死鸡心血、肝、脾、肺及胸腹部皮下水肿液，分别接种于可供本菌分离用的普通肉汤、普通琼脂平板、血琼脂平板、麦康凯琼脂平板、SS琼脂平板等培养基，于37℃恒温箱中培养18-24h，观察菌落的特性和颜色。

label: [{"start":14,"end":18,"text":"绿脓杆菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 菌落呈蓝绿色者，可初步诊断为绿脓杆菌。

label: [{"start":22,"end":26,"text":"健康雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"腹腔","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: (3)动物试验：取24h肉汤培养液，腹腔接种健康雏鸡，每只0.2ml。

label: [{"start":13,"end":14,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":14,"end":15,"text":"心","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":17,"text":"肝","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":18,"end":19,"text":"脾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":20,"end":21,"text":"肾","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":31,"end":35,"text":"绿脓杆菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 同时设立对照。从死亡的试验鸡心、肝、脾、肾等脏器中能重新分离到绿脓杆菌，即可确诊。

label: [{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"绿脓菌素","labels":["disease"]}]
text: (4)血清型鉴定：包括免疫血清的制备，玻片凝集试验，血清学分型法和绿脓菌素分型法，均参考王世鹏的方法进行。

label: [{"start":7,"end":13,"text":"加强饲养管理","labels":["control"]},{"start":14,"end":22,"text":"搞好卫生消毒工作","labels":["control"]}]
text: 防治措施：1、加强饲养管理，搞好卫生消毒工作。

label: [{"start":2,"end":9,"text":"应用抗生素治疗","labels":["control"]},{"start":4,"end":7,"text":"抗生素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":35,"end":39,"text":"庆大霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"多粘菌素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":45,"end":50,"text":"羧苄青霉素","labels":["drug"]},{"start":51,"end":57,"text":"磺胺嘧啶敏感","labels":["drug"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"绿脓杆菌","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 2、应用抗生素治疗，根据药敏试验结果选择用药。多数报道认为，绿脓杆菌对庆大霉素、多粘菌素、羧苄青霉素和磺胺嘧啶敏感，用于治疗本病有效。

label: [{"start":24,"end":32,"text":"开发研制生物制品","labels":["control"]},{"start":80,"end":91,"text":"生产高免血清或研制疫苗","labels":["control"]},{"start":2,"end":6,"text":"绿脓杆菌","labels":["disease"]},{"start":9,"end":13,"text":"抗菌药物","labels":["drug"]},{"start":41,"end":45,"text":"高免血清","labels":["drug"]},{"start":46,"end":48,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":82,"end":86,"text":"高免血清","labels":["drug"]},{"start":89,"end":91,"text":"疫苗","labels":["drug"]},{"start":66,"end":72,"text":"绿脓杆菌血清","labels":["drug"]}]
text: 3、绿脓杆菌对多数抗菌药物极易产生耐药性，有必要开发研制生物制品。但至今尚未见有以高免血清或疫苗来防治该病的报道。然而我国流行的主要绿脓杆菌血清型的定型，为今后生产高免血清或研制疫苗提供了科学依据。
